biotools.summary: Tool for sensitive iterative sequence searching based on HMM-HMM comparison. Starting from a single sequence or an alignment, it is able to build alignments with as many near or remote homologs as possible allowing users to explore protein superfamilies.

bioschemas.name: HHsenser
bioschemas.summary: Tool for sensitive iterative sequence searching based on HMM-HMM comparison. Starting from a single sequence or an alignment, it is able to build alignments with as many near or remote homologs as possible allowing users to explore protein superfamilies.
